bibl.title: Alexandria: The Underwater Site near Qaitbay Fort.
bibl.note: Emergency underwater excavations in 1994 and 1995. The site contains sculptures, architectural remains and gigantic stone blocks (from the Pharos?).
bibl.seg: EMPEREUR Jean-Yves, Alexandria: The Underwater Site near Qaitbay Fort.
Egyptian Archaeology 8 (1996) pp. 7-10, 8 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Emergency underwater excavations in 1994 and 1995. The site contains sculptures, architectural remains and gigantic stone blocks (from the Pharos?).
